p: The importance of ‘balance’ for health and wellness has been emphasised in other studies on Indigenous cultures (Mackean 2009; McKendrick et al. n.d). Ihara and Vakalahi (2011, p. 405) and Manuela and Sibley (2013, 2015), for example, noted from a Pacific perspective, “wellness does not exist without the balance of the spirit, body, mind and environment”.
